p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
[From Dr Von Mueller relative to some plants from the Botanical Garden Received and the Town Clerk instructed to reply stating that the Council would wait till next April as he suggested]
M's letter was read at a meeting of the East Collingwood Borough Council on 30 August 1871. See also A. McNaughton to M, 4 September 1871.
